meaningMnemonic: If you want to have a <radical>tsunami</radical> at your <radical>wedding</radical>, you need to make sure you have it at the <kanji>bay</kanji>. Anywhere more inland, and the tsunami won't reach it in time.
readingMnemonic: How did you get a tsunami to show up in the <kanji>bay</kanji> in the first place? By throwing a bunch of <reading>ura</reading>nium (うら) in there, of course! Its highly unstable nature can make any body of water, especially a calm bay, turn violent.
